攘.definition: (literary) to push up one's sleeves; (literary) to reject; to resist; (literary) to seize; to steal; (literary) to perturb; Taiwan pr. [rang2]

攘善.definition: to claim credit due to others; to appropriate others' credit or honor

攘場.definition: to spread harvested grain over an area

攘外安內.definition: to resist foreign aggression and pacify the interior of the country (idiom)

攘災.definition: to ward off calamities; to avoid disaster

攘羊.definition: to take home sb else's stray sheep

攘袂.definition: to rise to action with a determined shake of the arms

攘辟.definition: to stand off; to make way

攘除.definition: to get rid of; to weed out; to reject
